__TOC__



The page is designed to show each of the current teams in the Ubuntu project. If your team is not listed here, please go and add it.

* <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam|Mozilla Team]]</nowiki> are the guys and gals that deal with Mozilla software in Ubuntu
* <nowiki>[[FoundationsTeam|Foundations Team]]</nowiki> cares for a variety of critical components needed for building and running the Ubuntu platform

=== Localisation and International Users ===

LoCo teams should ''not'' list their teams here. LoCo teams can be found on the <nowiki>[[LoCoTeamList|LoCo Team List]]</nowiki>.

* A map of Ubuntu Users throughout the world is available at <nowiki>[[UbuntuWorldWide|Ubuntu Worldwide]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[LoCoTeamList|List of LoCo Teams]]</nowiki>
* The <nowiki>[[TranslationTeam|Translation Team]]</nowiki> co-ordinates the translation of Ubuntu into many languages
